title: 122A.54 EXCHANGE TEACHERS.
text:
A person holding a license and contract to teach in a Minnesota public school and assigned by the employing district to teach elsewhere is an exchange teacher.
Any district is authorized to assign a teacher for service elsewhere than in the employing district in exchange for a teacher with qualifications satisfactory to the commissioner.
The exchange teacher shall retain all rights in the employing district as though teaching in that district.
